Rime Shackles.name: Rime Shackles
Rime Shackles.fullText:
Icewrought Sentinel Attack 11Rime Shackles

Your weapon strikes with bitter cold that freezes the target in its tracks.

Encounter        Cold, Primal, Weapon
Standard Action      Melee weapon

Target: One creature

Attack: Strength vs. AC

Hit: 1[W] + Strength modifier cold damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn. On your next turn, if you hit the target with a primal cold power, the target is immobilized until the end of its next turn.


Published in Primal Power, page(s) 111.
Rime Shackles.flavor: Your weapon strikes with bitter cold that freezes the target in its tracks.
Rime Shackles.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier cold damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn. On your next turn, if you hit the target with a primal cold power, the target is immobilized until the end of its next turn.

Form of the Icewrought Sentinel.name: Form of the Icewrought Sentinel
Form of the Icewrought Sentinel.fullText:
Icewrought Sentinel Attack 20Form of the Icewrought Sentinel

A protective sheath of ice covers you and spreads to hinder your foes’ movement, coating your weapon to blind a foe when you strike.

Daily        Cold, Polymorph, Primal
Minor Action      Personal

Effect: You assume the guardian form of the icewrought sentinel until the end of the encounter. While you are in this form, you gain a +2 bonus to AC and Fortitude. In addition, your enemies cannot charge or run if they start that movement within 2 squares of you, and each square within 2 squares of you, wherever you move, is difficult terrain for your enemies.
Once during this encounter, you can use the Form of the Icewrought Sentinel Attack power while you are in this form.


Form of the Icewrought Sentinel Attack

Encounter      Cold, Polymorph, Primal, Weapon
Standard Action      Melee weapon

Target: One creature

Attack: Strength vs. Reflex

Hit: 3[W] + Strength modifier cold damage, and the target is blinded (save ends).

Miss: Half damage, and the target is blinded until the end of your next turn.


Published in Primal Power, page(s) 111.
Form of the Icewrought Sentinel.flavor: A protective sheath of ice covers you and spreads to hinder your foes’ movement, coating your weapon to blind a foe when you strike.
Form of the Icewrought Sentinel.effect:
You assume the guardian form of the icewrought sentinel until the end of the encounter. While you are in this form, you gain a +2 bonus to AC and Fortitude. In addition, your enemies cannot charge or run if they start that movement within 2 squares of you, and each square within 2 squares of you, wherever you move, is difficult terrain for your enemies.
Once during this encounter, you can use the Form of the Icewrought Sentinel Attack power while you are in this form.
Form of the Icewrought Sentinel.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier cold damage, and the target is blinded (save ends).
Form of the Icewrought Sentinel.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is blinded until the end of your next turn.

Icewrought Armor.name: Icewrought Armor
Icewrought Armor.fullText:
Icewrought Sentinel Utility 12Icewrought Armor

A shell of ice spreads across your ally, offering protection even as it freezes a foe that dares to strike.

Encounter        Primal
Minor Action      Close burst 3

Target: You or one ally in the burst

Effect: The target gains a +2 bonus to all defenses until the end of your next turn. If the target is hit by a melee attack before the bonus ends, the attacker is immobilized until the end of its next turn, and the bonus ends.


Published in Primal Power, page(s) 111.
Icewrought Armor.flavor: A shell of ice spreads across your ally, offering protection even as it freezes a foe that dares to strike.
Icewrought Armor.target: You or one ally in the burst
Icewrought Armor.effect: The target gains a +2 bonus to all defenses until the end of your next turn. If the target is hit by a melee attack before the bonus ends, the attacker is immobilized until the end of its next turn, and the bonus ends.
